price: Setie ne kasapa (na εyε ma wͻn). Na sε yεde dwuma no si y’ani so, εna nka wͻredi nokorε ama Onyankopͻn a, nka εyε ma wͻn.
arabic: طَاعَةٞ وَقَوۡلٞ مَّعۡرُوفٞۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ فَلَوۡ صَدَقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ṭāʿatun waqawlun maʿrūfun fa-idhā ʿazama al-amru falaw ṣadaqū al-laha lakāna khayran lahum
